attributes.action: Stop animals being sold online on shopping websites.
attributes.additional_details: Searching through Shpock you can immediately see hundreds of dogs for sale with many not looking in a well-nourished condition and with no checks on sellers and buyers there is no one to ensure these animals are being looking after legally.
attributes.background: Many animals mainly dogs are being sold on shopping sites like Shpock and Gumtree and have often been abused and neglected.
